name: Domain of Forgery: Leading Karma IV
description:
The fungal beasts proliferated in frightening numbers outside, and even the tranquil ruins would also become fertile soil for them.
Destroy the monsters within to obtain materials with which to enhance your equipment.
disorder: When affected by Quicken, the opponent's All Elemental RES will be decreased by 20%. This effect will be removed 5s after the opponent exits Quicken.
